hackathon-description-text: Welcome to Hack the Burgh—the hackathon beyond the wall— is back in Edinburgh for the third time!
hackathon-eligibility:
Hack the Burgh is open exclusively to those who are participating in this hackathon in Edinburgh.
All hackers should have booked a ticket via Eventbrite and have had their tickets checked upon arrival.
hackathon-rules:
You can read the MLH code of conduct 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Take a job, and make it automated.
Make a game from a given constraint and theme.
Create the highest scoring bot over the weekend. Join #sponsor-aigaming to discuss the challenge. Pick up a pack from the AIgaming table to get started.
Use the micro bit to make something awesome.
We choose the two best hacks of the weekend.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Informatics Forum, 10 Crichton St, Edinburgh EH8 9AB, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: What technologies did you apply to create your breath taking break-through hack? How elaborate is it?
Have you fulfilled your goals? Perhaps you solved challenge? How much did you learn and how much effort did you put into your work?

hackathon-location-address: Informatics Forum, 10 Crichton St, Edinburgh EH8 9AB, UK
hackathon-description-header: The hackathon from beyond the wall.
